title: Tommy Gets a Trumpet
originalTitle: Tommy étrenne son cor de chasse
plot: Tommy secures a hunting horn of wonderfully resonant tone. Trying it in the shop, he causes so terrific a draught that the old shopman is hurled backwards through the window. He then gives a public performance, and with one accord the occupants of the houses hurl chairs, tables, cushions, etc. at Tommy. Tommy's next feat is to blow a large party into the air, to fall through the roof of a house, and each succeeding floor. Naturally Tommy is the object of revenge, but after a humorous chase, he turns the trumpet on the pursuing crowd with marvelous results.
